turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where can I order some pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i'll place the order at bella luna. what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what do you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one buffalo chicken, one taco, and one with sausage pepperoni and mushrooms and all of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, bella luna does not have buffalo chicken pizza, nor do they have the second one you mentioned?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to order something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, just give me instead of those give a supreme and bacon and ham, and a pineapple one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so the order was for 3 medium pizzas, 1 supreme, 1 bacon ham and pineapple, and 1 sausage pepperoni and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And all of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56.39 is the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That works.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, please do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've submitted the order for pick up. it'll be ready for you in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
